==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=筷菜}}

===Etymology===
Sailors' euphemism for {{zh-l|*韭菜}}. Due to homophony of {{zh-l|*韭}} and {{zh-l|*久|long (time)}}, {{lang|zh|韭}} is replaced with {{zh-l|*快|fast; quick}}. Compare {{zh-l|筷子|chopsticks}}.
